text: Alfredo Adolfo Ríos Camarena (born 18 October 1935) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2006 to 2009 he served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Nayarit. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Nayarit Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st- century Mexican politicians
title: Alfredo Ríos Camarena
